content: finished measurements length 14 width 10½ pattern notes front and back of purse are worked separately and seamed together toppings are made separately and sewn to the front piece the strap is crocheted seamed together and then sewn to the sides of the purse a zipper is added at the end materials premier® yarns basix™ 100% acrylic 5 oz/140g 245yds/224m mc 1115-54 butterscotch 1 ball cc1 1115-73 dijon mustard 1 ball cc2 1115-72 cherry red 1 ball cc3 1115-75 lime 1 ball cc4 1115-76 spruce 1 ball cc5 1115-04 black 1 ball hook us size 7 4 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle 12 zipper sewing needle and thread skills/techniques used in this pattern single half double and double_crochet stitches front post standing and slip stitches working through the back loop working flat and in the round seaming and applique sewing sewing in a zipper
